website_summaries.verdict: The Huawei MediaPad M3 is the best small and stylish Android alternative to the Apple iPad Mini 4.
pros: The Huawei MediaPad M3 has a stylish and sturdy aluminum design
The HD screen is sharp and the fingerprint sensor is fast
It has dual Harman-Kardon speakers that are crazy-loud
cons: Audio sounds tinny at maximum volume

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet!
customer_reviews.text: Best Android tablet I have owned, which includes the Asus ZenPad 2016 and Tab S 8.4. +Display looks great, even scaled to 1080p +Stereo speakers sound great for a tablet or laptop +Device does not get hot under load with gaming or streaming +Device is Fast +Games and emulators play better than any tablet to date +Battery life is very good +Sleep mode does not drain battery (only 2% in ten hours) +Allows hardware scaling to 1080p for battery life (for GPU use on average, adds an hour to screen on time) +Wifi signal is great -Do not like the UI, so using Nova until 5.0 is available in US -Wish had USB C Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: RockBoy

customer_reviews.title: The best tablet in 2016 no one is buying...
customer_reviews.text: For those looking for a tablet that surpasses Samsung in audio (Harman Karman) and screen look no further this is the best tablet in 2016 no one is buying. I've been using this tablet for a good 2 weeks and i must say its amazing. The only reason i don't give this 5 star is MI UI is really annoying. I recommend a launcher for all Huawei devices and second this doesn't support 5GHZ wifi which is absurd in this day in age, but i can look pass that. This tablet also has a bit of weight to it and is not as light as an ipad air mini.
customer_reviews.author: KARL PERALTA

customer_reviews.title: If you can adjust to the quirky home button, you will love this Huawei MediaPad
customer_reviews.text: I wanted another Samsung tablet, but smaller. Saw this and took a chance. I tend to like it better than the Samsung and it cost about half what the Samsung 8 inch tablet would have cost. I'm referring to the higher end Samsung tablet -- not the cheap ones with poor screen performance. But, this MediaPad has a quirky home button that takes some getting used to. If they were to improve anything, I would strongly suggest they make the home button more like other tablets. I will say also that the battery life is far better than my Samsung tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Annoying touch button, but good price and excellent battery life
customer_reviews.text: Works well enough. As the other reviews have said, the touch button does get quite annoying and is extremely easy to trigger. However, despite that it makes a pretty good media center tablet. I took it on some international travel with an SD card loaded with movies and it worked perfect for this use case. Very long lasting battery too. I must've watched videos on it for around 10 hours before I bothered charging it, and even then it was only down to around 30%
customer_reviews.author: jordan earls

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful tablet in both form and function
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful tablet in both form and function. Fast, smooth operation and the SD port is awesome to have onboard for additional storage. Sound is fab and display is crisp, bright, and clear. Only con is that it is still running Android 6.0, in spite of the product description saying it would update to 7.0 soon after activation. I purchased it in early December and still no update. This is probably not an issue for most users and not a huge issue for me, but I'm a tech geek to the core :-P Other than this, it is a solid tablet that will please most, if not all owners :-)
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Capone

customer_reviews.title: Best Android Tablet Available
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this tablet as a replacement for my Nexus 7 tablet which really started to show it's age. I opted for the 64gb version so I can load a bunch of movies in advance. I like the way Huawei chose to deploy Android on the device and I really like the soft settings based navigation options for home, multi-tasking, back, and notifications. The best things about this tablet are the size for my travel bag and of course the speed and general look of the tablet; it's beautiful and the screen is vivid. The built in Harman Kardon speakers are a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Mike in Denver, CO

customer_reviews.title: This is a great tablet!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a 32gb version and a 64gb version and just love them, my only complaint would be that it uses Micro USB instead of USB c. The 64gb version comes with some really nice ear buds.
customer_reviews.author: Neil P.

customer_reviews.title: CHECK OUT APP NEEDS FIRST
customer_reviews.text: Product has some nice features, but found it will not allow all Google Playstore apps to download and be used, especially in the financial field.(Which I used frequently) I spent 2 1/2 hours yesterday with Amazon Tech(Usual hard reset, clear cache, etc.), Hauwei Tech(Waste of time), and Google Play store(Tech was very knowlegable, ran hour's worth of tests, could not fix issue, but assured me had to be issue in Tablets software.) Amazon would not accept that, was told last night "all Android tablets don't necessarily have to work with all Google apps(News to me) Amazon would not take tablet back, so guess I'll have to sell it at loose, or root it
customer_reviews.author: Bob Whitlow

customer_reviews.title: Happy Huawei M3 owner
customer_reviews.text: My previous tablet was a first generation Nexus 7 inch that I loved for many years. Unfortunately, progressive upgrades lead to increased frustration and I waited throughout 2016 for the rumoured release of a new Nexus. I gave up in December and did some homework. The huawei m3 64gb consistently came up as the best smaller tablet option. I've had it for about a month and am ecstatically happy. It's responsive, easy to customise to what I like to work with abd, so far, I'm not missing my Nexus.
customer_reviews.author: Mignon Wells

customer_reviews.title: Avoid this tablet!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Huawei MediaPad M3 64gb in June 2017. Initially I was really impressed by the glitzy overall looks, performance, storage and the sound quality ?(Harman Kardon), etc. But, over time I got more and more disappointed by it's built quality. Just within six months of use, I got a whole patch of dead pixels on the lower screen. Some apps starts to crash, Microsoft Outlok stops working. The screen blacks out frequently. Since I cannot return this item after 6 months, it is quite useless to me now. I do not recommend this tablet. There are other much better ones in the market.
customer_reviews.author: Lajos

customer_reviews.title: Died quickly, Huawei didn't honor warranty.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for myself for xmas, three months later it is on sale on Ebay for parts. The device auto- upgraded the EMUI, Huawei's in house UI, about a month after getting it, and it started to act funky, shutting down at random times, showing a notice saying it had not passed a validation. Well, i send it to Huawei for warranty work, and they say it had been rooted (I dont know how to root a device, and didnt try to), and that the warranty was voided. On top of that they wiped the device, and it no longer even turned on. So... if you need parts, head to ebay! Terrible customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: ... (16GB) is my third Android Tablet and is the BEST EVER! My first was the original Google Nexus ...
customer_reviews.text: The Huawei MediaPad M3 (32GB) is my third Android Tablet and is the BEST EVER! My first was the original Google Nexus 7 (2012) followed by another 7-inch tablet by HP and all the shortcomings of these two tablets have been corrected in the MediaPad for a very reasonable purchase price. Transferring my paid Google Play Apps was never easier with the use of the Google "Set up my device" feature which transferred my Apps (most of them) and saved a lot of setup time. I think the Huawei MediPad M3 is the best value and has the best performance for the Android Tablet user.
customer_reviews.author: P. Wing

customer_reviews.title: Sharp, Fast, and Versatile. If you want a small tablet you can't go wrong with it
customer_reviews.text: Great Tablet Very nice surprise. Nicely packed, with an included screen saver. Sharp, vibrant screen, very clear text, fast and responsive. I bought this as a replacement for a nexus 7. I will be using it primarily as an e-reader. It fits very nicely in my hand, for one handed reading. I have tried several Kindle Fire tablets, including the current HD version. The Fires had very disappointing resolution, very fuzzy text, unlike their e-ink offerings. This will be a light, easy to hold and versatile device.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin H

customer_reviews.title: A rocket-fast and beautiful Android tablet for cheap
customer_reviews.text: This is the best Android tablet I've ever owned, after owning two generations of Nexus 7s. I had previous bought a Lenovo Yoga Tab to replace the last Nexus, and I ended up returning it because I was unimpressed with the processing power and the efficiency of jumping among apps. The Huawei MediaPad brings an excellent screen, decent enough sound, and the type of agility that users of high-end Android phones expect. Battery life has also been terrific. I can use it for all kinds of activities, and I still only charge it a couple times per week. And it's only a fraction of the price of a Pixel tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Quick shipping to Canada and no additional fees/taxes charged on arrival. The tablet did not automatically upgrade to Nougat/ EMUI 5, so I followed instructions posted on xda forum--no rooting involved and it was quick and easy. After manually installing 5.0, the update to 5.1 was automatically offered by Huawei. I'm loving the M3 so far. It's fast, the build quality and display is excellent and the sound quality thru speakers has surpassed my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet. Compared this tablet and the Apple iPad ...
customer_reviews.text: Great tablet. Compared this tablet and the Apple iPad mini. Tried a friend's iPad mini. Finally decided to go with the Huawei tablet. No regrets... Enjoy the Android operating system. The Huawei is very well constructed. I read a lot of ebooks using the Kindel ebook reader...the reading display is excellent and battery life is very good. This tablet replaced my old Nexus 7.
customer_reviews.author: mw

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for the buck!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice piece of hardware. Build quality is great, the screen is beautiful and the UI is not too intrusive (I prefer stock Android). It is rootable and the bootloader can be unlocked, as well. The device works great with everything I do with it, including playing a lot of games like Clash of Clans, Boom Beach, Clash Royale, Leo's Fortune, Monument Valley, Need for Speed, etc. Battery life is not "amazing" but it's not bad either. I get about 4-5 hours of heavy gaming, which is more than manageable. The form factor with the ~8 inch screen is great and perfect for what I'm doing with it. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: A real honey of a tablet
customer_reviews.text: I've had so many tablets I can't count. IPad, Nexus, Samsung, Sony, HP, Dell, Asus, you name it. And I love them all, but I have to say, this tablet is a favorite. Everything about it is just about perfect. The one thing it isn't is waterproof....and I learned the hard way. So, unfortunately, I lost the tablet to water damage...it still worked but it wouldn't charge and the home button no longer worked. I tried to get it fixed with no luck, so I didn't hesitate for a second... I bought another and am typing this review on it now. It's a sweetheart...
customer_reviews.author: Bettikins

customer_reviews.title: 256 GB
customer_reviews.text: I bought to use as a music listening device. This device will support a 256 GB Micro SD card contrary to other comments here. Some say these will not support a 256 GB card. They work fine for me. This being said, I was very disappointed in the sound. Through wired and wireless headphones. They advertised the excellent sound quality. Mine distorts at high volumes and is noticeable worse than an old 12.5" Samsung pad I have. My old pad is almost at its end. I have already refurbished a couple of times. I was looking for a replacement, so the extra Harman-Kardon excited me. I ended up very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: ShopHawk

customer_reviews.title: I took very good care of it
customer_reviews.text: After several months, it had a puff of smoke and I thought it was dead. I took very good care of it. Couldn't get it to charge. On Prime Day I bought a Fire HD 10 because I didn't want to spend a few hundred dollars on a short lived tablet. I have sense learned that my Huawei will charge at normal (not fast charge speed) if I turn it off and then plug in the charger. A little research showed that there is likely a bad board on the tablet -based on complaints I have seen across the net. I won't be buying Huawei again. Until it puffed, it was a great tablet ...probably worth the price tag.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer AV

customer_reviews.title: All in all extremely pleased with this tab
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tab. Does everything you need. Running Nova Launcher. Handles every game so far (Dawn of Titans, Morphite, racing games)... No issues. Sound is good, its a tab, what do you expect. Screen resolution is great. Bluetooth works with Pioneer AV receiver. Not sure what the complaint is about WIFI.....2.4 is just fine....streaming Netflix, Amazon, playing games, etc is no issues. If having issues I would check out the 12 month warranty. Highly recommend this tablet.
customer_reviews.author: LiveLife

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tablet.
customer_reviews.text: This has got to be the best tablet I've had in a while. It's fast, easy to use, the fingerprint sensor works great and the sound is amazing. I've owned several tablets (both nexuses, shield tablet and even the predator 8) and this tablet, imo is better than all of them. I only hope that it gets updated to nougat. Update: this tablet has been updated to nougat and it's even better now. Way to go, Huawei!
customer_reviews.author: psychociclon

customer_reviews.title: Loudest output
customer_reviews.text: Bought this unit because everyone said that it has the loudest speaker output. They were probably right. I use it for showing friends a short video in less than ideal situations, like restaurants. It's clear, and can be heard better than anything I've seen. Other than that, it does everything that I ask it to, and that I can expect of a tablet. It's a little too big to fit in a cargo pocket. Display is great.
customer_reviews.author: R. Lee

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with with the operation of this tablet
customer_reviews.text: I brought this tablet to replace my Nexus 7 2013. I am very pleased with with the operation of this tablet. The minute I received this tablet I open the box put in my password and email address information into the tablet and it automatically upgraded to nougat 7.0. not only that I also got Google Assistant. Even though Google announced that Google Assistant would not be coming to tablets. This tablet is lightning fast. The screen resolution is amazing. And one thing I didn't expect was how loud and amazing the stereo speakers are. I'm one very happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Best value and most up to date specs in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Best value and most up to date specs in the midsize android tablet market. Definitely sad that 5Ghz Wifi band is not out of the box enabled for the North American market, but there are ways to enable it. Huawei support could be better, with more timely updated being offered in a traditional manner (you can find updates from "firmware finder" before they show up natively as available on your device). Definitely a nice replacement for my out of support Nexus 7.
customer_reviews.author: Joe S.

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad I did
customer_reviews.text: I hadn't seen one of these in person. I went solely off the reviews from Amazon and CNET. I'm glad I did. The screen in great; the processor is fast and it doesn't come with too much bloatware. It's great for reading, and videos. It searches the Internet well and Huawei's version of Android really fits me well. I was going to buy a Samsung, but I'm glad I waited and went with Huawei.
customer_reviews.author: Bicycleboy

customer_reviews.title: Very good!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my Mother in law to replace her nexus 7. I couldnt find anything under $500 or so that was worth buying and then I found this. Specs are good, looks nice, good size and display. Took a shot and its great, she loves it. The screen is very vibrant, its nice and snappy. Great tablet for this price range
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Well performer all around.
customer_reviews.text: Tablet works well for everyday use and some gaming. I personally find it a bit uncomfortable to hold in landscape for longer periods of time but your mileage may vary. Screen is bright and reproduces colors well, works in sunlight, speakers are decent. Processor is fast and fingerprint sensor really takes some getting used to as it also doubles as android buttons. Included AKG headphones are really good.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Fast and great battery life (2017) Recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely satisfied with this tablet. At time of of writing I've now had it for a couple months, very impressed. FAST. Great battery life. Not for hi-res photos, but I don't use it for that. Great product for Summer 2017 dollars.
customer_reviews.author: JAMES K

customer_reviews.title: Best replacement for the Nexus 2013
customer_reviews.text: I love this tablet. I bought it because my Asus Nexus 2013 was laid low with a cracked screen, or I never would have given it up. The MediaPad is a welcome replacement. It is a far superior product. Metal case, metal buttons, crisp screen, fantastic audio. Down side for me was the slightly larger size. It took some training to adapt to one-hand grasp. I also like the extra SD card storage. This has now become my primary device for every day online activity. I rarely turn on the laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value and my favorite gadget
customer_reviews.text: I picked this up to have a tablet to match my Huawei Matebook X Had this for a few weeks. Absolutely LOVE it. Only critique: wish it was IP658 waterproofed but I'll deal with it not being that. The software is tight on this thing without a lot of extraneous applications that you have to remove. The Huawei laptop / tablet client software is an absolute breeze to deal with. Samsung is about to lose a phone customer not because they did something wrong, but these guys are doing something VERY right.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Bright, beautiful, long battery and THIN AND LONG...instead of block shaped like the other tabs!
customer_reviews.text: Wow Huawei......just wow. This thing is awesome, and it was to replace my Tab2.....which was 'eh'.....fine. THIS thing is SWEET.....it runs way longer than my Tab2 or my Nexxus ever did.....Sound i loudest of the 3 as well. Display is amazing. This tab being 'thin and long' , rather than more block shaped is a massive tactile advantage over other tabs........its basically the superhero big brother to my Nexxus. If you're curious about tabs. You won't find better.......points can be argued of preferred "best tablet out", but this tablet is one of them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice in a tablet.
customer_reviews.text: I am really pleased with this tablet. I have the 64 GB version, and I added a 64 GB microSD card. I upgraded to Android 7.0 with no difficulty. The tablet looks, feels, and works great. I also have an iPad mini 4. I would carefully consider the MediaPad M3 before buying the iPad. If you really prefer Apple products, then go with the iPad mini 4. Otherwise, the MediaPad M3 is an excellent choice. I like it best in a lot of ways. Completely satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JDG

customer_reviews.title: This I'm not that happy with compared to my Samsung Galaxy S tablet but ...
customer_reviews.text: This I'm not that happy with compared to my Samsung Galaxy S tablet but that has finally worn out. This is not as fast or as smooth. The scrolling sticks frequently. Probably one of the worst investments I've made in tech. Would return but put screen cover on so I will toss it it the trash to make sure no one else has to deal with it.
customer_reviews.author: daniel rathbun

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Mavic Pro!
customer_reviews.text: I took a chance after sending back a galaxy s2 8in tablet. It would run dji go nor litchi reliably. This huawei works perfectly with bith apps and is ood in the sun. Slightly larger than controller but will post a 3d print file for a mount specifically for this tablet. Best sound of any tablet pretty much ever. Try some flac music on youtube. update: it wants me to upgrade to IMU 5.0 to go with Android version 7.0. I'm on 6.0 right now and DJI and Litchi work PERFECTLY. Not going to upgrade for a while. You can't really go back without losing everything.
customer_reviews.author: goofyfoot

customer_reviews.title: Best tablet I've found.
customer_reviews.text: Considering the price, I thought this was going to be a low-mid line tablet. Nope! Better specs than the Galaxy Tab3! Runs smoothly, updated to the latest android OS and now runs so smoothly! I love this tablet. I don't like the home button functions though, but not a strong enough con to not get the tablet, in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: TheTinyPadawan

customer_reviews.title: Great 8in Android tablet!
customer_reviews.text: Tablet so far is fast, feels great, amazing audio, and beautiful screen. The reason I am taking 1 star off is due to some features of EMUI. The recent update prevents you from having the navbar and fingerprint gestures on at the same time which makes no sense. It is very helpful having them both turned on, there are times when I prefer one over the other. I see no reason why they wouldn't allow them both to be turned on. Another thing is face unlock is a feature of just about every Android device but this device does not have that feature. Overall this is a great tablet and probably the best Android tablet in this size.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: I came from a Google Nexus 7 (2013) and I didn't think I would find a tablet as good as that one in the same price range
customer_reviews.text: My first Huawei purchase, and I'm very impressed. The build quality is sleek, solid and confidence-inspiring. The response is snappy, the touchscreen feels silky and the UX is very well thought out. And the display is, well...stunning. I came from a Google Nexus 7 (2013) and I didn't think I would find a tablet as good as that one in the same price range. And I didn't; this is far superior
customer_reviews.author: Joseph M Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tablet - buy it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful tablet. I had a Samsung for 6 years and it stopped working over the holidays. Since the price for the Samsung is still expensive I opted for this 32GB tablet. Turned out to be a great choice. Works great out of the box. Synced it with my Android LG phone. There were no headphones included. Would have been nice. I have been using the tablet for 4 weeks now and love it.
customer_reviews.author: Miss My4Cents

customer_reviews.title: Good hardware, pointless proprietary OS
customer_reviews.text: Good performance with modern app requirements, especially gaming. OS is a bust though... wish it came with stock Android. If you ever want to factory reset this and want to sell it, remember to specifically deactivate post-reset account verification or your buyer will hate you big time (and may wait for you in front of your place with angry intentions... I know I wanted to do that!). In a nutshell: a good product if you can put up with the pointless OS coming with it (or if you are up for reflashing a stock android).
customer_reviews.author: Bullfrog

customer_reviews.title: Great multi-tasking tablet
customer_reviews.text: 4GB RAM! It makes a big difference when multi-tasking. The only nitpick is that after getting used to "pure Android" in the Nexus tablets, the interface is hard to get used to. For example, installing an app automatically creates a shortcut on the home screen, which doesn't happen with "pure Android". I still highly recommend it just for the 4GB RAM.
customer_reviews.author: Erick

customer_reviews.title: This tablet has become my "go to" for most of my computer needs!
customer_reviews.text: After a lot of research, I bought this tablet. It's pronounced wawe for those people like me who don't know how to pronounce it. I purchased it in May 2017. I love it! I use my tablet about 95% of the time. I use my PC occasionally when I need to do something that would be easier on a PC. Otherwise, I am using this tablet!
customer_reviews.author: J. K.

customer_reviews.title: I love this tablet!
customer_reviews.text: I have three different Samsung tablets that I love, but I was in the mood for a new toy. So I purchased this tablet, and I absolutely love it. It's extremely responsive to touch and really zippy at everything (opening apps, etc.). I don't mind the Huawei launcher at all. It really doesn't seem very different from my Samsungs. I highly recommend this tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Book Hoarder

customer_reviews.title: A great tablet by Huawei
customer_reviews.text: I was considering Samsung and Apple tablets before I purchased this tablet. I already have iPad Air and iPad Air 2 but I prefer this one a lot more. Fast and cheaper than the alternatives. Great speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Customer

customer_reviews.title: This tablet is one of the best I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: This tablet is one of the best I've ever owned. Not o my is it fast and reliable let, the price-point is great. I love the size of it, and the battery lasts me almost all day. There is one app (Verizon messenger) that worked on my old Dell tablet, buy refuses to work on this one. Hopefully this will be resolved with an update at some point.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Hart

customer_reviews.title: Love it. It's fast and runs everything I want ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It's fast and runs everything I want it to. The single home button at the bottom takes some getting used to, but now it feels more natural than the normal Android Apps/Home/Back keys. If you don't like this feature, you can change the settings to display software keys instead. Speakers are pretty decent. I crank them up when cooking. Missing 5Ghz hasn't been a problem so far. Everything streams just fine. (But c'mon Hwawei, pay the FCC licensing fee and unlock it for us!)
customer_reviews.author: spaz

customer_reviews.title: Great hardware poor user experience.
customer_reviews.text: The specs and design of this table are great, but the Emotion UI is far too buggy. The screen sensitivity had issues where it would slow down while scrolling. Changing the display size to small had a weird effect on Chrome where you couldn't switch tabs. Some apps weren't compatible. This is not really a tablet is just a big phone.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Ruesta

customer_reviews.title: This is the absolute best tablet I've owned
customer_reviews.text: This is the absolute best tablet I've owned. I've recently owned an Azus and that big Lonova Yoga with giant battery. This Huawei tablet is amazing! On initial bootup it upgraded to Android Naugat which was nice. The color is amazing, the speed is great and the sound as well. This is a very very nice tablet, especially for the price. Great features and the UI is excellent IMO.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Clark

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy if you need root/twrp
customer_reviews.text: Quite difficult to root/twrp after update to latest android version. I do not recommend for folks whom require that level of customization like I do. On that note it is also very easy to brick in the process. (Something that you dont see often with newer devices. Just a warning as you can completely blow away the ability to even get into fastboot...) In the end I was quite sad as it is a beautiful tablet. Now it is a pretty paperweight. :(
customer_reviews.author: Dan Tech Man

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant replacement for Samsung tab s 8.4 users
customer_reviews.text: Really impressed with this device. Updated my tab s 8.4 and I am very happy. Immediately updated to Android 7 and v5 of its OS and it is speedy, similar size to my old Sammy (a few mm taller) and has a long battery life. I probably wouldn't consider going back to the Sammy even if they released an s3 8.4 based on price along. The Huawei is well built and will do the distance. My only issue is that 5ghz wifi is not activated on this version (they didn't apply for FCC compliance) but at some point I may edit the system file required to achieve this - although it has good strong wifi as is
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High end tablet without high end prices
customer_reviews.text: So far, I love this tablet. I did change the launcher as I didn't care too much for the Huawei one. I have no issues with speed and the screen is just magnificent. The sound is better than any phone or tablet I've ever tried. You get the appearance of a high end tablet without paying high end prices.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Some of the hardware seems more suited to a smartphone then the old tablet I was used to. Which makes sense for a smartphone company. Upgraded from a Google Nexus 7 tablet. The graphics and sound are beautiful. Like the fingerprint security feature. Screen is very responsive, everything seems to load quickly. Mainly use for reading, studying, browsing internet, and YouTube.
customer_reviews.author: H. Timmons

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic game and movie Media Pad. Lots of time waitin for Doctors so, it gives me something to do. I run more programs, games, and movies, with more speed ad hardly any drag.
customer_reviews.author: janette costanzo

customer_reviews.title: Long battery life. Awesome speakers. Nice display.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome graphics and apps run smooth. My only gripe is that it only has 2.4G wifi support and not 5G. Other than that, the tablet has way better than average speakers and a long battery life. Not sure on how many hours but I watched movies on a good part of a 12 hour flight and still had 26% life when we landed.
customer_reviews.author: A Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great device but not for me.
customer_reviews.text: This device seemed very good. Picture and sound quality were great. I had an issue with the amount of actions that we're controlled by the finger print reader. I did not like it and found it difficult to adapt too. Others may not feel the same. In the end I returned the device. I was unable to get a few apps to run correctly, ones I use regularly, and do not have the technical skills required to identify and overcome the issues. Again, others may not have the same experience. I do want to say Amazon came through, as always, and I left a happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: DZL

customer_reviews.title: Not 100 % Android compatible
customer_reviews.text: The tablet will not show Chromecast shortcut button on the top right corner after installed the Chromecast app. like other Android on the smartphone. Another problem is the fingerprint scanner not always work. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: PCK

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic tablet
customer_reviews.text: First off let me say that the picture quality of this tablet is far superior to any that don't use the 2560 resolution. Another aspect of this tablet that i find appealing is its size. I am able to manipulate it with one hand when I want but it is still large enough to watch movies and easily surf the web.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Little Tablet
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tablet. I did my research and already have an iPad Air. I wanted a smaller tablet that I could take to work everyday. I wanted an android OS. This is the best. Beautiful video and I end up taking with me on vacations because of its size.
customer_reviews.author: William J. Trignano

customer_reviews.title: RIP iPad
customer_reviews.text: Another iPad killer. Cheers to Huawei and Android for creating a top-notch tablet that will NOT break the bank. If you're tired of the app-restricting and costly Apple products, then this tablet is for you. *FYI: It comes with its own screen protector. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Duke Pine

customer_reviews.title: Possibly the best android tablet out right now
customer_reviews.text: This tablet has incredible battery life and a quality screen. I haven't had any issues with it. There are a few built in apps I disabled because I only use this for browsing and watching video. Speakers on this think are quite amazing.
customer_reviews.author: codeaddict

customer_reviews.title: Very good build quality
customer_reviews.text: Very good build quality, with a nice screen, and dual speakers. Theres no physical button and I haven't found the onscreen buttons either, which makes it confusing to use at first. But the finger print scanner acts as the back button, multitask, and close button. You have to get use to it, but eventually you get the hang of it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Aramaki

customer_reviews.title: just 30% volume will give you nice bass and clarity
customer_reviews.text: Screen is ok, speakers are loud enough but I need 100 on volume while using wired headphone or bluetooth, I was able to install Dolby Atmos on my Galaxy Note and 10.1 tablet because it's rooted, just 30% volume will give you nice bass and clarity, Dolby Atmos on non rooted tablet can only give you equalizer but not volume leveler and surround virtualizer, I am so addicted to Dolby Atmos.. I'll keep it. nice UI..EMUI is cool
customer_reviews.author: Tony Usi

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet to last years
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this tablet. The specs are great and it is a great multimedia tablet. The speakers are amazing and the screen I great. The majority of people think I have an iPad due to the quality. I highly recommend this product:) the only bad thing is finding cases for it, not many options.
customer_reviews.author: Lamuel Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Excellant tablet in a great size
customer_reviews.text: Well designed tablet in a great size. The sound is amazing for a tablet and the screen is very sharp and the color is beautiful. My only issues are it has not been updated to Android 7 yet and it does not support 5gHz wifi.
customer_reviews.author: RMSCHUYLER

customer_reviews.title: Great Tablet!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't be happier with this tablet. Slim, light, fast, and dependable. I haven't found the 2.4 GHz Wi-Fi limiting. The charger the unit comes with charges amazingly fast even when in use. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good,  but the power button stucks and it is all over and over
customer_reviews.text: Loved it ...until it lasted. Power button was a problem since the beginning, until it began to get stucked everytime. And all my data was reset several times as well. Until it could not even restart because so many restarts. From the comments I noticed that many have experienced trouble with the power button as well. Be careful, it is serious. Asked for help to Huawei..still waiting for the return label after several days. Hope it will work otherwise I will have to get a Samsung Galaxy Note A 8. Sounds more trustworthy.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Great Tablet!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great tablet. Wanted to get away form Samsung for awhile so i gave Huawei a chance. Very please with the change i made. Resolution is Outstanding. 4 GB Ram. The speed is so much faster. And the price is much more affordable for what your getting compared to Samsung or Apple.
customer_reviews.author: RichG

customer_reviews.title: what a fine tablet.
customer_reviews.text: I did not expect such quality for this price. I am in love. Already bought another one for my wife, and changed my other phone to Huawei. Also love it. So i just ordered Huawei laptop matebook x signature. it has raving reviews so i expect it will be same great.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Lehmann

customer_reviews.title: A great tablet by Huawei
customer_reviews.text: This tablet is amazing! It is especially great at multimedia consumption, Netflix and Amazon Prime Video. The Hartman/Kardon speakers are great, sound awesome, and can get very loud. I highly recommend this tablet!
customer_reviews.author: Terrell Morgan

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice, light weight tablet that fits into your back ...
customer_reviews.text: Pro: This is a nice, light weight tablet that fits into your back pocket. It has a nice, bright display and good sound. I found it a good replacement for my aging Samsung Galaxy Tab S. The bloatware is minimal and most can be uninstalled. Con: It does not have a built-in flash for the rear camera and it does not include a split screen mode.
customer_reviews.author: Jason A

customer_reviews.title: Mostly good, but a few dings.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be working well. I like the relatively recent version of Android, and the expandable storage. Not a big fan of the EMUI software skin or the small number of aftermarket accessories.
customer_reviews.author: WavesOfFury

customer_reviews.title: Solid Performer!
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased this Tablet and so far things are great. Tablet is pretty fast and responsive. Battery has been really great for me. I use it for reading online watching YouTube videos, Netflix, etc. I also use it for work using it for looking at manuals and such. By the end of the day (around 10pm) still have 30% of battery life. It's been able to handle anything that I throw at it. Great for any media consumption.
customer_reviews.author: Vsatisfied

customer_reviews.title: Shes a bute!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect tablet! Love this product. Fast processor; never lags! Battery is awesome! I get 3 days out of it if just using for normal surfing and emails, facebook, twitter. 24 hours if movie watching. The graphics of this tablet are spectacular! Bright, clean, crisp. I really love my tablet and I am so glad I did not go Apple.
customer_reviews.author: melrahn

customer_reviews.title: great little tablet
customer_reviews.text: great little tablet, nice high res screen, good battery life, fast snappy UI. I mostly use this for astronomy software and kindle. taking me a bit of time to get used to the funny multi-mode touch button instead of the more typical android arrow, circle, square on-screen buttons.
customer_reviews.author: Left Coast Geek

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Tablet
customer_reviews.text: I love this tablet! The size is perfect (just slightly smaller than an iPad and thinner) and the speakers/sound on this little guy are incredible! Nothing disappointing about this product.
customer_reviews.author: kelly

customer_reviews.title: Appropriate price for the spec
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to watch movies and surf the news. It performed extremely well so far. Except that the system gets slow once you use it often but it is really depending on the OS.
customer_reviews.author: Luckas

customer_reviews.title: Durable and works great
customer_reviews.text: We've been using this unit for over a year. Works great and haven't had any major issues. Battery life as it was when we first purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Huawei makes great hardware.
customer_reviews.text: Well built, great form factor, light weight. I don't think you can get better than this at its price point.
customer_reviews.author: Wilson F.

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet with a great processor
customer_reviews.text: Huawei is up there with Samsung and apple. Great wifi tablet. Really fast. Has the same processor as the mate 8. Everything about it is fluid.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Jane zanelotti

customer_reviews.title: Good tablet
customer_reviews.text: It works well. My mother use it to play slot games all day long, and she just need to reset it once a week or so. The battery life is great. Speed of apps is fast and smooth. Picture quality is just so so, but the sound is nice.
customer_reviews.author: philpw

customer_reviews.title: Great, responsive tablet for the price
customer_reviews.text: I wish this were 0.5" smaller, and I wish the buttons were slightly less sensitive, but overall, this is an outstanding tablet for the price. Snappy, looks great, everything just works.
customer_reviews.author: DoctorOfRock

customer_reviews.title: ... me with their products in that they are as good or better than the big name items
customer_reviews.text: Huawei always amazes me with their products in that they are as good or better than the big name items. The battery last forever and the speed is superb. It is everything the advertisement says and more. Even the box that it came in screams class. GREAT TABLET!
customer_reviews.author: Automated Business Sys

customer_reviews.title: I love this tablet
customer_reviews.text: I love this tablet! It's the perfect size and is very responsive and quick. And the speakers are amazing for a mobile device. Definitely 100% recommend if you're looking for a new tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Erica.

customer_reviews.title: I really like it, once I switched the launcher from the ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like it, once I switched the launcher from the annoying Huawei launcher to the Nova launcher. The hardware button took me a little getting used to, but now I really like it - very very handy for getting out of fullscreen games.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Had almost two years and it still rocks
customer_reviews.text: This tablet is almost two years old and it has been fantastic. Excellent battery life and screen is great. I will be looking more at the Huawei brand from this experience!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Petey

customer_reviews.title: Great deal on a beautiful Android tablet.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great device, and I got it for a great price around christmas. It is fast, as pretty as an ipad (thicker though), and works flawlessly. I wanted something that was like my phone for when I was home, and this is awesome. Movies, books, games, email - all great on this...
customer_reviews.author: Mjolnir. PMA

customer_reviews.title: Solid performance and good speakers
customer_reviews.text: Has worked well. The speakers sound real good and can be plenty loud. Crisp images and solid performance. Got it to replace are Nexus 7 and it's turned out to be a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: meikol

customer_reviews.title: Good quality design
customer_reviews.text: It's speedier than other tablets of the same category I tried (i.e. Asus Zenpad). Good quality design, weight, aspect ratio. The one thing I really do not like is Huawei's tendency to copy the Apple IOS UI.
customer_reviews.author: carioca

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this tablet for about two months and it is such a good tablet and works so well for games and videos.
customer_reviews.author: Arwen Evenstar

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and good value tablet.
customer_reviews.text: New tablet for my son. He loves it. Perhaps it's not the fastest tablet on the market, but it runs all of his games and feels top quality with aluminum case.
customer_reviews.author: Neutronman

customer_reviews.title: Highly suggest it!
customer_reviews.text: Highly suggest it! The battery last very long even with some heavy applications, and barely notice the weight as well. They only things that lag of is 5G wifi support. Else this is perfect for the prices tag! .
customer_reviews.author: Simon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tablet. It's very fast and I haven't had ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tablet. It's very fast and I haven't had any issues with it at all. The only downside is there isn't any 5Ghz wifi but I haven't had any issues connecting to 2.4Ghz at all. It's also updatable to Android Nougat now which feels a lot smoother.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet
customer_reviews.text: Great tablet. It is replacing my old Nexus 9 and it runs way faster and cleaner. Good to have a Fast tablet again.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Jensen

customer_reviews.title: The sound is awesome, as well as the screen, and the battery life more than great
customer_reviews.text: The screen is just gorgeous, the sound is awesome and the battery life more than great. Really fast fingerprint unlock. It got updated to Android Nougat right after first setup and it looks perfect. Love it to read books, watch Netflix and Youtube, browsing and social networks.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for media consumption
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Great display. Fantastic sound for a tablet. Pretty good GPS. Great for media consumption. Perfect size. Using Google launcher. High specs. Cons: no 5Ghz wifi, the micro USB charging port stopped working after a year of light use. Not sure how to fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good price good value.
customer_reviews.text: A good tablet for multiple uses. Good product for it's price!
customer_reviews.author: Storm1063

customer_reviews.title: no 5 GHz wifi
customer_reviews.text: No 5 GHZ wifi. it only works with the 2.4 GHz wifi
customer_reviews.author: Rob_is_Spot_On

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: a little odd interface but easy to get over and a very nice sound and speed.
customer_reviews.author: Philippe Jeanty

customer_reviews.title: I really like being able to group apps in folders by type
customer_reviews.text: Fast! Android update became available within a few months of purchase. I really like being able to group apps in folders by type! Light sensor does great job of adjusting the display. My only complaint is that the screen will not rotate to all four positions, only one vertical position available. Would definitely recommend and buy again!
customer_reviews.author: F

customer_reviews.title: Good tablet for the $$
customer_reviews.text: Good tablet for the $$. Android's OC moves away from intuitive a bit, and sometimes it slows down a little. But it is a fairly good unit.
customer_reviews.author: Will Bishop

product_meta.title: Huawei + Harman Kardon MediaPad M3 8.0 Octa Core 8.4" Android (Marshmallow) +EMUI Tablet, WiFi only, 32GB, Moonlight Silver (US Warranty)
product_meta.description: Style:32 GBHUAWEI MediaPad M3 8.0 is a tablet that can provide extreme audio and video experience. It is tuned and certified by Harman/Kardon and supports HiFi earphones. It is the pinnacle works. The M3 has a stylish, narrow bezel, and lightweight aircraft aluminum body measuring just 4.6 mm thick, making it a highly portable device and easy to grip. It features a 2560 x 1600 pixel IPS display; 8 MP rear camera and HD video; 8 MP front camera; high-speed Internet connectivity; high definition voice calling (supports loudspeaker and earphone calling, does not have receiver); 1080p video hardware decoding; office productivity suite; GPS; fingerprint sensor. It is a smart assistant of your life entertainment.
feature_bullets: 8.4-inch tablet that boasts a proprietary HI Silicon octa-core processor and high-speed Wi-Fi network connectivity;Contrast: 1500:1
Features a 2560 x 1600 pixel IPS display; 8 MP front & rear camera and HD video; high-speed Internet connectivity (does not support 3G/LTE); office productivity suite; and GPS
Tuned and certified by Harman/Kardon to provide a paramount audio and video experience, as well as support HiFi headphones (AKG headphones only included with 64GB version)
Google Android 6.0 (Marshmallow) with Huawei Emotion UI 4.1
Highlights a stylish narrow bezel and lightweight aircraft aluminum body measuring just 4.6 mm thick, making it a highly portable device and easy to grip

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars486 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
